ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:43:20 [Issue ID 4000-121589] urn:comicvine:4000-121589
ComicInfo.Summary:
The wait for the return of the Darkness is over! Jackie Estacado is back...but can't remember anything after the fire that took the life of his Uncle, the Mafia boss, Frankie Francetti. As the rest of the family waits to see if Jackie will take his Uncle's place, Jackie is consumed by the things he can't quite remember...things that wait for him in the deepest depths of the DARKNESS!!
SPOILERS
Jackie Estacado is back after taking the life of Uncle Frankie and his own life in the process.
As the darkness seems to be gaining more control of Jackie, giving him the power to predict the death, Estacado will have to face the new head of the Franchetti Family
